description: go/build, runtime/cgo: cgo support for NetBSD/ARM

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

build.go looks good to me. Can't speak with confidence about the cgo stuff.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229082/diff/4001/src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c
File src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c (left):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229082/diff/4001/src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c#oldcode77
src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c:77: // out of pthread_attr_getstacksize.  C'est la Linux.
This was copied from gcc_freebsd_arm. Could you please make a note to go back and fix this.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=36b36840f7f1 ***

go/build, runtime/cgo: cgo support for NetBSD/ARM

R=golang-dev, rsc, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7229082

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229082/diff/4001/src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c
File src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c (left):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229082/diff/4001/src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c#oldcode77
src/pkg/runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c:77: // out of pthread_attr_getstacksize.  C'est la Linux.
On 2013/02/11 00:19:49, dfc wrote:
> This was copied from gcc_freebsd_arm. Could you please make a note to go back
> and fix this.
Sure.

subject: code review 7229082: go/build, runtime/cgo: cgo support for NetBSD/ARM
